record.Name: Javascript
record.Purpose: As the main programming language for the fullstack web project.

record.Name: HTML5
record.Purpose: No way not using it in web app

record.Name: CSS3
record.Purpose: Essential for styling webapp

record.Name: TailwindCSS
record.Purpose: For enabling utility-based styling. I use it on almost every of my web app to avoid writing in pure CSS which feels so hard to maintain.

record.Name: MaterialUI
record.Purpose: Accelerate development process with the use of styled components.

record.Name: NodeJS
record.Purpose: For programming the backend part for application that use JS/TS.

record.Name: NextJS
record.Purpose: Use it as fullstack framework for webapp that use JS/TS.

record.Name: ExpressJS
record.Purpose: As the framework for the backend part of Javascript app.

record.Name: MySQL
record.Purpose: Primary choice for relational databases.

record.Name: MongoDB
record.Purpose: Primary choice for non-relational databases.

record.Name: Github
record.Purpose: Manage the project source code. Always use it all the time.

record.Name: VS Code
record.Purpose: Primary text editor. Use it all the time. Still learning at using it without use mouse/touchpad at all.

record.Name: AWS
record.Purpose: to make complex cloud environment that a project need.

record.Name: Docker
record.Purpose: Primary containerization tool for shipping app to production or testing fast and flexible.

record.Name: Playwright
record.Purpose: For testing web app or for crawling tool on website.

record.Name: Python3
record.Purpose: Used when making something that is related to data analysis or AI/ML.

record.Name: Terraform
record.Purpose: For deploying infrastructure via code.

record.Name: Jenkins
record.Purpose: Secondary choice for CICD tool. I choose it because of the huge add on that can be used.

record.Name: Github action
record.Purpose: Primary choice for CICD tool because the out of the box intergration with the github.

record.Name: GCP
record.Purpose: Use it as the supporting choice for AWS in making app that need to use complex cloud environment.

record.Name: Kubernetes
record.Purpose: To manage operation of complex cloud environment.

record.Name: ReactJS
record.Purpose: The foundation for all of the framework used, for example NextJS and MaterialUI.

record.Name: Programming
record.Description: Problem solving via coding using any programming language. This includes determine the time and space complexity.

record.Name: Design pattern
record.Description: Knowledge and experience in making decision about what design pattern best to use.

record.Name: Cloud computing
record.Description: Knowledge about general cloud computing technology, not about certain CSP.

record.Name: UI/UX design
record.Description: Experience in making interface that user can comfortably use.
